 class Dropout2d(_DropoutNd):

+    r"""Randomly zero-out entire channels (a channel is a 2D feature map of
body: I feel that the explanation of channel here isn't very clear still. People who don't know the concept will still be confused how this works. Maybe say something like `` (e.g., the `j`-th channel of the `i`-th sample in the batched input is the 2D tensor `input[i, j]`) ``
body_html: I feel that the explanation of channel here isn't very clear still. People who don't know the concept will still be confused how this works. Maybe say something like (e.g., the `j`-th channel of the `i`-th sample in the batched input is the 2D tensor `input[i, j]`)
body_text: I feel that the explanation of channel here isn't very clear still. People who don't know the concept will still be confused how this works. Maybe say something like (e.g., the `j`-th channel of the `i`-th sample in the batched input is the 2D tensor `input[i, j]`)
